DocAttribute.Name: Role
DocAttribute.Documentation: The name of the role played by an actor. If the Role has value USERDEFINED, then the user defined role shall be provided as a value of the attribute UserDefinedRole.

DocAttribute.Name: UserDefinedRole
DocAttribute.Documentation: Allows for specification of user defined roles beyond the enumeration values provided by Role attribute of type IfcRoleEnum. When a value is provided for attribute UserDefinedRole in parallel the attribute Role shall have enumeration value USERDEFINED.

DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: A textual description relating the nature of the role played by an actor.

DocAttribute.Name: HasExternalReference

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If the attribute _Role_ has the enumeration value USERDEFINED then a value for the attribute _UserDefinedRole_ shall be asserted.
